text: Conversation Piece () is a 1974 Italian French erotic drama movie directed by Luchino Visconti and starring Burt Lancaster, Helmut Berger, Silvana Mangano, Claudia Marsani, Romolo Valli, Philippe Hersent, Umberto Raho. ==Other websites== * Category:1974 drama movies Category:1974 LGBT movies Category:1970s erotic movies Category:Italian LGBT movies Category:Italian drama movies Category:French LGBT movies Category:French drama movies Category:Movies directed by Luchino Visconti Category:Movies set in Rome
title: Conversation Piece (movie)
